price: (Saa nipa no), Amanehunu gya no da n’anim, na nsuo hyeε a εbͻn na yεbεma no anom.
arabic: مِّن وَرَآئِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ وَيُسۡقَىٰ مِن مَّآءٖ صَدِيدٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: min warāihi jahannamu wayus'qā min māin ṣadīdin
translations: and he will be made to drink
